programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Dari Empang Kok Jadi Sayang

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 35
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. programme.title: 28 CINTA YANG KUJAGA
programme.desc: Rama, a wealthy child who is lazy and undisciplined, is punished by his father for being expelled from college. His father sends Rama to a village, where he meets Dea, a teacher who is working in the village and intends to advance the education there. Rama always causes trouble and annoys Dea, as he, now a goat herder, constantly interrupts her while she teaches. Since meeting Dea, Rama's life has started to improve, and he is becoming a disciplined man. Will Rama fall in love with Dea?

programme.title: La Montagne
programme.desc: Pierre, a Parisian engineer, goes to the Alps for work. Irresistibly attracted to the mountains, he quickly gets hold of the equipment needed to go hiking and camping at altitude. Once up there, he decides to never go down again and meets Lea.

programme.title: Fraiche
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 13
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 41
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous ! - EP 14
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 45
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles - EP 47
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles - EP 48
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 1
programme.desc: Api is a bit sad: she remembers everything she shared with eric and Fatou. Unfortunately, after an argument, they no longer speak to each other...

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 45
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 31
programme.desc: Disappointed at not having been accepted for the school hockey programme, Maya wants to change things for the girls. evelyne loses a competition.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 2
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances - EP 6
programme.desc: September 1941. One night, an English plane is shot down and crashes into the sea. Chaos in the village: the Germans are searching for the man seen making a parachute landing. The following day, the children discover the injured English pilot in their secret den and decide to hide him.

programme.title: Matiere Grise - EP 4
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Mission Apprentis - EP 4
programme.desc: In front of the cameras and within a limited time, six apprentices will have to take on a professional challenge and give their best to convince experts.

programme.title: Le Beau Velo De Ravel - EP 3
programme.desc: A bike journey, presented by Adrien Joveneau, along the entire RAVeL network, an independent cycle path network in Wallonia. With each programme, the presenter tells us of a stage in his journey and talks about mobility and tourist resources in the region.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera - EP 49
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Waouh ! - EP 13
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 1
programme.desc: Soudeh Rad is a militant queer ecofeminist who condemns the traditional education she received in Iran. After enduring a forced marriage and domestic violence, she fled to France. She took this opportunity to launch a movement called 'Osez le feminisme' ('Dare to be Feminist') and the association 'Spectrum'.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 46
programme.desc: On the occasion of the 118th edition of the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, interview with Melanie-Antoinette de Massy, president of the Monaco Tennis Federation, and David Massey, its director. They share their anecdotes and memories of this legendary tournament.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pa T'mentir - EP 6
programme.desc: Hip-hop was born in the American black and Hispanic communities in the 1970s. And yet, in Quebec, the majority of commercially successful artists are white. Why?

programme.title: Serge A Paris - EP 6
programme.desc: Serge talks about imposture, art and delinquency with Quebec host Stephan Bureau. He then takes a tour on a bateau-mouche with the Belgian singer Pierre de Maere, a committed artist who is involved in every aspect of his career.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel - EP 5
programme.desc: After leaving the Cornav√≤sa mountain hut, the hikers confront the icy knife-edge ridges of the Via Idra, before reaching the Borgna refuge. It's then time to confront their final peak and take a moment to look back on the most unforgettable moments of their breathtaking trek.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 6
programme.desc: Exploring the exhibition ''Psychanalyse d'un Meuble a Quatre Pattes'' at the Monnaie de Paris. All about ballet flats. Julia Terranova, designer for the jewellery brand YAY. Staple of the military wardrobe, cargo trousers are back. The Comite Colbert organises a fair dedicated to expertise and know-how in the luxury industry.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 3
programme.desc: Visit to the three museums at the Polish Library in Paris. Shapes navigate between imaginary worlds in ceramic artist Clementine de Chabaneix's universe. Willy Chavarria, American-Mexican designer and activist, shows at the American Cathedral in Paris. Bookbinders and gilders, Nathalie and Christophe Legrand restore books which they cover in light.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''Swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu La - EP 6
programme.desc: Video games are the leading pastime of the Z generation. They are also a means of expression and a way of bringing youngsters together and socialising. Audrey, Alexis and Michelle are committed in their own way to making the gaming world healthier and more positive.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: 100 % Logique - La Reponse Est Sous Vos Yeux - EP 14
programme.desc: The quiz that, rather than testing general knowledge and culture, tests the participants' powers of logic, observation and common sense. One hundred candidates compete for a jackpot that could climb to 100,000 euros. Who will manage to overcome all the obstacles and reach the final question?

programme.title: Memoires A Vif
programme.desc: The deputy mayor of Valbonne is due to unveil a commemorative plaque for Harki soldiers but a body is found at his home. Commanders Belhassen and Bonfanti investigate and become quickly immersed in the complex past linked to the Algerian War and the fate reserved for Harki soldiers in France.

programme.title: Sch - Le Concert De L'orange Velodrome
programme.desc: As part of his Decennium tour, rapper SCH is celebrating 10 years in the music business with a special concert at Marseille's Orange Velodrome. A grandiose show, in front of more than 53,000 spectators, with a host of guests: JuL, Kofs, Naps, Soso Maness, Elams, Solda, Houari, Sofiane Pamart, Squeezie...

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: L'or Bleu Des Alpes, Un Bien Menace
programme.desc: Amidst Europe's highest mountains, scientists, divers and mountaineers begin a totally unique exploration in the icy waters of the Alps. From the summit of Mont Blanc to the depths of the high altitude lakes, they set out to demonstrate the vulnerability of our most precious resource: freshwater.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Qu'est-Ce Qu'elle A Ma Famille ?
programme.desc: Celine and Mathieu, a farming couple, applied to adopt five years ago. A social worker visits them, but is only able to offer a child with multiple disabilities. The social worker's trainee quietly slips them the contact details of a friend who, with his partner, had used a surrogate mother...

programme.title: La Peinture Francaise Autour Du Monde - EP 7
programme.desc: A fine arts museum located in Pasadena, to the north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum displays a superb collection of European paintings, from Renaissance to Modern art. Classical French art is represented by Lorrain, Poussin, Fragonard, Robert, Boucher, Vernet, Vigee Le Brun...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 14
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 42
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous ! - EP 15
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 46
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles - EP 49
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles - EP 50
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 2
programme.desc: It's the teacher's birthday! The whole class celebrates with him in a light and joyful atmosphere. But Api is not in the mood for the party: her friends no longer speak to her.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 46
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 32
programme.desc: Felix persuades Lounis to start dating. Flavie is invited to her aunt's in San Francisco but Ian isn't sure about letting her go on her own.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 3
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: OPJ - EP 15
programme.desc: In the early morning, Gaspard Watson suddenly arrives at Clarissa's, completely disoriented and covered in blood that is visibly not his own. His last memory is of having left the police station the day before, and thereafter nothing: a total blackout.

programme.title: OPJ - EP 16
programme.desc: As Jackson manages to piece together Gaspard's actions during the course of the previous evening, he discovers that he'd been in the company of a woman who has since disappeared. Did Gaspard commit a crime, or is someone trying to frame him?

programme.title: Carbone - EP 9
programme.desc: We are all worried about the climate, but we're still not doing enough to solve the problem. Is our psychology acting as a brake on climate action?

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 15
programme.desc: Vietnam has a long history with the French language. When the French withdrew in 1954, the spoken language gradually declined, but today it is seeing a revival throughout the country. Here is the story of Francophonie past and present, from the historic French districts of Hanoi to the Mekong delta.

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes - EP 6
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde - EP 6
programme.desc: Marie-Pierre Lissoir is an ethnomusicologist and researcher at the Traditional Arts and Ethnology Centre. On foot or by tuk-tuk, she shows Adrien her daily life in Luang Prabang, on the banks of the Mekong. From the splendor of Buddhist temples to animist ceremonies, a journey between contemplation and meditation.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Carte Aux Tresors - EP 4
programme.desc: Heading for the Perigord Noir. The game stretches from the Dordogne and Vezere valleys from Lascaux to Biron via Limeuil, Sarlat and La Roque-Gageac. Contestants: Noemie and Antoine.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 26
programme.desc: On top of their oil reserves and destination as a chic destination, the United Arab Emirates are genuinely interesting from a tourism perspective, mainly due to their surprising contrasts: mountains, deserts, beaches, oases, avant-garde buildings, traditional picturesque markets... The 21st century blends with ancient history and sometimes unsettles tourists.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs¬†! - EP 5
programme.desc: The eight cooks compete to produce a winning dish of fried quail with appropriate accompaniments. During the challenge, some of them will also have to present a fried onion starter whilst the others will be preparing apple fritters.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites - EP 5
programme.desc: The aim of the Debout en Bouts association is to raise awareness of the inequity of the financial cost of prostheses, to bring about changes in legislation and to enable the funding of such equipment and support for amputees. With Matthieu Lartot, Brahim Asloum, Jerome Fernandez, Vincent Clerc, emilie Andeol, Sarah Ourahmoune, Jean-Baptiste Marteau.

programme.title: Corporate
programme.desc: emilie Tesson-Hansen, a young and brilliant HRD, is recruited to sack the aging managers of a big company. But when one of them commits suicide, the police start investigating and emilie finds herself in the firing line.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #3
programme.desc: The very best from the 2024/25 season as Hollywood superstar Michael B Jordan tries to guess what happens next when he watches some infamous PL moments. Emi Martinez ranks his best saves while Liverpool legend John Barnes answers some burning questions.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS - USA SUMMER SERIES: West Ham United v Everton
programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's USA Summer Series.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS - USA SUMMER SERIES: Manchester United v Bournemouth
programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's USA Summer Series.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 5
programme.desc: We peel back the layers on the Premier League's most iconic managerial rivalries; battles that shaped eras, defined clubs, and captivated fans around the world. From the fierce mind games between Arsene Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson, to the emotional explosion of Kevin Keegan's title-chasing Newcastle. From the simmering tension and touchline clashes of Mourinho vs. Wenger, to the tactical chess match between Jurgen Klopp and Pep Guardiola.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 8
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie football families together.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #2
programme.desc: Welcome to the Weekend head to the Midlands in this episode of the best from the 2024/25 season as JJ, Olivia and Andrew are pitchside at the King Power Stadium. Ayo gets unrivalled access at Anfield while Afrobeats star Joeboy joins the team on the sofa.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #3
programme.desc: The very best from the 2024/25 season as Hollywood superstar Michael B Jordan tries to guess what happens next when he watches some infamous PL moments. Emi Martinez ranks his best saves while Liverpool legend John Barnes answers some burning questions.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 5
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Morgan Rogers, Joelinton, Martin Odegaard and Ryan Gravenberch.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE AMERICAS UNITED
programme.desc: A thrilling showcase of legendary footballers from the Americas who have stepped into the Timeless studio, featuring Tim Howard, Dwight Yorke, Wes Morgan, John Barnes, Brad Friedel, and others.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: Arguably the greatest American goalkeeper of all time, Brad Friedel made an incredible 450 appearances in the Premier League playing for Tottenham, Aston Villa, Blackburn and Liverpool. We sit down with the 52-year-old to recount his incredible journey to the top of English football.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: PL RAW: STORY OF THE SEASON 24/25
programme.desc: Look back on another incredible Premier League season through the lens of PL RAW, featuring all the biggest and best moments from the 24/25 campaign.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #3
programme.desc: The very best from the 2024/25 season as Hollywood superstar Michael B Jordan tries to guess what happens next when he watches some infamous PL moments. Emi Martinez ranks his best saves while Liverpool legend John Barnes answers some burning questions.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 8
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie football families together.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 5
programme.desc: We peel back the layers on the Premier League's most iconic managerial rivalries; battles that shaped eras, defined clubs, and captivated fans around the world. From the fierce mind games between Arsene Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson, to the emotional explosion of Kevin Keegan's title-chasing Newcastle. From the simmering tension and touchline clashes of Mourinho vs. Wenger, to the tactical chess match between Jurgen Klopp and Pep Guardiola.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 3
programme.desc: PGMOL Chief Refereeing Officer Howard Webb and current Premier League official Craig Pawson provide a unique insight into the skills required to referee at the top level.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 4
programme.desc: We sit down with ex-Premier League referee Howard Webb, to talk about his early days as a South Yorkshire policeman to becoming one of the most respected referees in world football. ¬†In this candid interview Webb shares stories of his rise through the Premier League ranks, culminating in the honour of refereeing the 2010 FIFA World Cup Final. ¬†Along the way, he shares the challenges, pressures, and defining moments of a career spent making the game's toughest calls on the biggest stages.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #2
programme.desc: Welcome to the Weekend head to the Midlands in this episode of the best from the 2024/25 season as JJ, Olivia and Andrew are pitchside at the King Power Stadium. Ayo gets unrivalled access at Anfield while Afrobeats star Joeboy joins the team on the sofa.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #3
programme.desc: The very best from the 2024/25 season as Hollywood superstar Michael B Jordan tries to guess what happens next when he watches some infamous PL moments. Emi Martinez ranks his best saves while Liverpool legend John Barnes answers some burning questions.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: He was recently inducted into the exclusive Premier League Hall of fame, but what made Andrew Cole so special? We sit down with the ex-Manchester striker to discuss his stand-out moments in the English top flight and chat to his teammates that knew him, to find out what really made him tick.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 47
programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno Guimar√£es to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2017/2018 season.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Newcastle United (MW25) - EP 245
programme.desc: Manchester City have lost just one of their last 34 Premier League games against Newcastle (W27 D6), going down 2-1 at St James‚Äô Park in January 2019.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Liverpool (MW19) - EP 186
programme.desc: West Ham have won just one of their last 16 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L12), beating them 3-2 at the London Stadium in November 2021.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Arsenal (MW17) - EP 165
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost just two of their last 19 away league games against Crystal Palace (W10 D7), with both defeats coming in the Premier League by a 3-0 scoreline (April 2017, April 2022).

programme.title: Chelsea vs Fulham (MW18) - EP 173
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last 19 home league games against Fulham (W12 D7) since a 2-0 loss in the second tier in October 1979.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Liverpool (MW17) - EP 170
programme.desc: Tottenham won this exact fixture 2-1 last season thanks to a 90th minute Joel Matip own goal. Indeed, this fixture has seen more 90th minute winning goals than any other in Premier League history (6)

programme.title: Arsenal vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW21) - EP 208
programme.desc: Tottenham have won just one of their last 31 Premier League away games against Arsenal (D12 L18) and are winless in 13 since a 3-2 victory in November 2010.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Nottingham Forest (MW20) - EP 200
programme.desc: Wolves have lost just one of their last 12 league games against Nottingham Forest (W5 D6) and are unbeaten in all five against them in the Premier League (W1 D4).

programme.title: Newcastle United vs AFC Bournemouth (MW22) - EP 211
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won their last nine matches in all competitions and the Magpies are looking to win 10 in a row for the first time in their entire history.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW24) - EP 231
programme.desc: Brighton won this exact fixture 3-2 last season - they‚Äôve never before won consecutive away league games against Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: Ipswich Town vs Manchester City (MW22) - EP 219
programme.desc: Manchester City have conceded 29 goals in 21 Premier League games this season, with their average of 1.4 goals conceded per game their highest in a single campaign since 2007-08 (also 1.4).

programme.title: Liverpool vs Manchester United (MW20) - EP 199
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 13 Premier League games against Manchester United (W7 D5), going down 2-1 at Old Trafford in August 2022.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Chelsea (MW23) - EP 226
programme.desc: Manchester City are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League games against Chelsea (W5 D2), since a 2-1 home loss in May 2021.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Nottingham Forest (MW26) - EP 259
programme.desc: Newcastle have lost just one of their 13 Premier League meetings with Nottingham Forest (W9 D3), though that defeat did come in this exact fixture last season (1-3).

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Chelsea (MW25) - EP 241
programme.desc: After a five-game unbeaten run against Chelsea in the Premier League (W2 D3), Brighton have now lost each of their last three against them.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Nottingham Forest (MW23) - EP 221
programme.desc: Bournemouth are unbeaten in their last 10 Premier League games (W6 D4), with only the current top two sides Liverpool (17) and Arsenal (12) enjoying a longer ongoing run at present.

programme.title: Everton vs Liverpool (MW15) - EP 141
programme.desc: Liverpool‚Äôs 2-0 loss in this exact fixture last season ended a 12-game unbeaten away run in the Premier League against Everton (W3 D9). They‚Äôve not lost consecutive visits to Goodison Park since a run of three between 1992 and 1994.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester City (MW24) - EP 239
programme.desc: Having won 12 consecutive league games against Arsenal between 2017 and 2023, Manchester City are now winless in their last three against the Gunners (D2 L1).

programme.title: Manchester City vs Liverpool (MW26) - EP 260
programme.desc: Manchester City have lost just one of their last 15 Premier League home games against Liverpool (W8 D6), going down 4-1 in November 2015 under Manuel Pellegrini.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Tshilumba Mikixi vs. August Kayambala
programme.desc: In this episode Tshilomba 'The Old Monkey' Mikixi takes on August 'The Barista' Kayambala in a lightweight clash.

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 1 from Dolphins Arena in Nagoya, Japan features Takarafuji, Ichinojo, Shimanoumi and Kiribayama.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC light middleweight title bout when Shane Mosley battles Saul (Canelo) Alvarez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Mary Romero
programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender Mary Romero of Spain. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September. She now steps into the ring against the former European Super Bantamweight Champion, Mary Romero.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: This episode features Shane Mosley looking for a win against Ricardo Mayorga, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Ryan Rhodes
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Saul (Canelo) Alvarez making his first defense of the WBC light middleweight title, taking on challenger Ryan Rhodes. The bout ends in the final round after a series of unanswered blows. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. programme.title: Saturday Drama "I Would Rather Die Alone" Eps. 5 (R)
programme.desc: Yamaguchi Narumi (Ayase Haruka) enjoys her single life. However, the solitary death of her admired aunt, a dedicated career woman, compels her to hastily pursue marriage-only to fail. Even her younger colleague, Nasuda Yuya (Sano Hayato), dismisses the idea that marriage equals security as an outdated notion. This prompts Narumi to make a drastic shift from "marriage hunting" to desperately exploring "end-of-life planning."

programme.desc: Yamaguchi Narumi (Ayase Haruka) enjoys her single life. However, the solitary death of her admired aunt, a dedicated career woman, compels her to hastily pursue marriage-only to fail. Even her younger colleague, Nasuda Yuya (Sano Hayato), dismisses the idea that marriage equals security as an outdated notion. This prompts Narumi to make a drastic shift from "marriage hunting" to desperately exploring "end-of-life planning."

programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: The Visualization Entertainment: Go! Kaneo-kun
programme.desc: The show is MC-ed by comedian Ariyoshi Hiroiki, who hosts an NHK program on a regular basis for the first time. The mascot character "Kaneo-kun" (voice of Nobu, of comedy duo Chidori), who loves money, visits various places, including popular visiting locations, and looks into different phenomena to learn how money plays a role. The undertaking help unravel unexpected trends in society. The program, which can be enjoyed by every member of the family, offers much food for thought.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 29
programme.desc: The story depicts the turbulent life of Tsutaya Juzaburo (Yokohama Ryusei), known as "Tsutaju", a man who laid the foundation for Japan‚Äôs media industry and pop culture. Despite the close scrutiny of the shogunate, he relentlessly pursued humor and entertainment. This thrilling drama is filled with laughter, tears, and mystery.

programme.title: Premium Drama "TERUKO & LUI" Eps. 4
programme.desc: Teruko (Fubuki Jun) goes for a drive with her best friend Rui (Natsuki Mari). It seems like a joyful trip, but in truth, it's a desperate escape. They start living in a villa in Yatsugatake, hiding their true identities. The story comically portrays, through songs and tears, how these two women in their 70s gain freedom, carve out a new life, and pass hope on to the younger generation.

programme.title: Iwata's Grandma
programme.desc: Why does Iwata's grandma refuse to be in photos? This animation documentary is based on a picture book about the atomic bomb tragedy but conveys kindness and hope rather than fear and anxiety.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: This programme gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia, explaining the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Ogata Yuko has developed a medical device that can measure foetal heartbeat and send the results to a doctor remotely - the goal is to make childbirth safer in places without specialised OB-GYN care.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about risshu and shosho, two dates of early autumn. The temple chefs show us how to prepare dishes using winter melon and share their recipe for a Japanese-style ratatouille.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: Sudden Shower: Caught in an evening shower, Edo townspeople scramble across a bridge in search of shelter; on the river beyond, a lone figure steers his boat unfazed by the rain. Where is he going?

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: iPS cells are being used to treat eye diseases to address donor shortages. We explore advancements made in Japan, such as the transplantation of iPS cell-derived corneal cells and retinal sheets.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: The world comes alive in a different way after sunset, with bright city lights or the glow of a 24-hour industrial complex. See how the scenery changes through the night with time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Johan Nordstrom, a film scholar from Sweden, specialises in early Japanese cinema - he tells us about movies from over a century ago and Japan's unique tradition of live narration for silent films.

programme.desc: This film follows the lives and words of three people - two atomic bomb survivors and a young ally - to convey a powerful wish: make Nagasaki the last place to experience the horrors of the atom bomb.

programme.desc: Mount Fuji's Threat to Tokyo: Mount Fuji is known for its repeated eruptions - after 300 years of silence, we can expect another eruption soon. Learn how to protect yourself from volcanic disasters.

programme.title: Designer-Less Design
programme.desc: Graphic designer Kikuchi Atsuki is drawn to enamelware that reflects the creators' own instincts - he talks about the appeal of designs made and used by the same person.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Samurai Castles
programme.desc: A castle 200km north of Tokyo was a battleground in Japan's last civil war in the mid-19th century - modern warfare did not bring it down. We look at the secrets to the its strengths and its lords.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Kanazawa City in Ishikawa Prefecture is a known castle town - in one commercial area sits a piano which passers-by love to visit and play from the heart.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hiroshima's Tower of Life
programme.desc: The Hiroshima Red Cross Hospital was one of the only hospitals still standing after the dropping of the atomic bomb - newly-uncovered files shed light on the ensuing weeks and months at the hospital.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Nagasaki: 188 Memories of the Bomb
programme.desc: Some 76 years after the atomic bomb was unleashed on the city of Nagasaki, NHK and the Nagasaki Atomic Bomb Museum asks survivors to create pictures to preserve their memories for future generations.

programme.title: NHK Hiroshima Theme Song
programme.desc: NHK Hiroshima's theme song by PORNOGRAFFITTI, marking 80 years since the city was atomic bombed - full of wishes and prayers for peace, it depicts a streetcar that ran three days after the bombing.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.desc: Watch Noh rehearsals in Tokyo's romantic Kagurazaka district with a kitty named Torakichi, then follow an alley cat to a popular coffee shop before enjoying geisha shamisen performances after dark.

programme.title: Xiaomai's Health Notes

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Murder Diary - EP 19
programme.desc: This crime thriller is centered around Ip King-fung, a police officer who develops Dissociative Identity Disorder after a childhood incident. King-fung's alternate personality, Chu Kei, becomes a skilled criminal profiler, aiding King-fung in dismantling criminal organisations.

programme.title: Heavenly Hand & What's On Today - EP 5
programme.desc: The owner of a mahjong hall witnesses the changing of the times, along with his group of neighbourhood friends in Wan Chai. His peaceful life is disrupted by a girl who has the same habits as him, and a USB of unknown origin.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2611
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: The Sword and the Brocade - EP 37
programme.desc: In the middle Ming Dynasty, the distinguished Luo family suffers a downfall and wanted to solve the crisis through a marriage arrangement. The intelligent and introverted Shi Yiniang is chosen to become the much-coveted madame of the Yong Ping Duke Manor.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: DM Me Now
programme.desc: Before travelling, doing research is essential, and referring to KOLs' travel videos is also a must for the new generation! Join our beautiful hosts as they choose Malaysia as their destination, and invite many popular Internet celebrities to act as local guides to lead them in food and fun!

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: Good Morning Hong Kong brings you the latest news that matter to you.

programme.title: Murder Diary - EP 20
programme.desc: This crime thriller is centered around Ip King-fung, a police officer who develops Dissociative Identity Disorder after a childhood incident. King-fung's alternate personality, Chu Kei, becomes a skilled criminal profiler, aiding King-fung in dismantling criminal organisations.

programme.title: Partners' Kitchen
programme.desc: Star artists and chefs become kitchen partners to take part in this cooking competition! The programme tracks the artists' practice, from entering a professional kitchen to learning to cook, understanding the skills and essence of the dishes along the way.

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This children's programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Beauty And The Boss - EP 9
programme.desc: Secretary Wong Lai-mei restarts her life after ending a marriage. She returns to work, meets new people and develops a new relationship with her boss Matt. With the passage of time, Lai-mei eventually understands she has got a grip on the essence of happiness.

programme.title: Beauty And The Boss - EP 10

programme.desc: The story follows Li Su Su (Bai Lu) as she assumes the identity of mortal Ye Xi Wu and travels 500 years ago to stop the demon lord's resurrection. As she journeys, her fate tangles with Tantai Jin (Leo Luo), the lord's captive prince.

programme.title: Till The End Of The Moon - EP 37
programme.desc: The story follows Li Su Su (Bai Lu) as she assumes the identity of mortal Ye Xi Wu and travels 500 years ago to stop the demon lord's resurrection. As she journeys, her fate tangles with Tantai Jin (Leo Luo), the lord's captive prince.

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 11
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 15
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal - EP 3
programme.desc: A former Taekwondo athlete, who is permanently banned from the national team, becomes a mental coach to help players in slump, heal retired athletes and engage a real match against the absurd world of winner-take-all.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 1
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 11
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 12
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 14
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: The Tale of Lady Ok - EP 4
programme.desc: The story follows legal expert Ok Tae Young (Im Ji Yeon) during the Joseon period whose name, identity, and husband are all fabricated. Entangled in a fierce survival scheme, entertainer Cheon Seung Hwi (Choo Young Woo) is willing to risk his life for her.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 2
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Police Station No. 7
programme.desc: WONG YING KOO (SIT KA YIN, NANCY), a jovial optimistic middle-aged woman, is always ready to offer help to others in need. She lives happily with her daughter SUEN MAN WAH (WANG, IRENE) and other members of her family. She is a good friend of her neighbour WONG CHI CHEUNG (HUI SHIU HUNG), whose son WONG KIM (NG KAI WAH, LAWRENCE) respects her and regards her as his own mother. Corruption is a major social problem of the time in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Stew of Life
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Story Of Zom-B
programme.desc: Not only people have to come up with brainy ideas, but zombies also have to engage in "eating brains" literally! Chav Yu Yeung-kwong (Matthew Ho) loses his mind and rushes to the morgue as he shockingly notices something unusual about his body. He eats a bloody human brain in front of his buddies, forensic intern Koo Tak-ming (Arnold Kwok) and doashi Wah Lun (Milkson Fong)! Since then, Yeung-kwong possesses someone else‚Äôs memory and skills when he eats their brain.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Golden Faith
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN‚Äôs parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Young Charioteers
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: To Grow With Love
programme.desc: Filipino-born Chinese HO MEI-TIN (WU, MYOLIE) has been slightly overweight since childhood. She is constantly teased about her chubby frame while in Hong Kong, where it is widely recognized that thinness is the essence of beauty. Feeling so frustrated and annoyed, TIN decides to move back to the Philippines. However, when she notices the comments left in her drawing in response to her views on love, she soon has a change of heart and chooses to stay and look for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Airport Strikers
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung‚Äôs (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Airport Strikers
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung‚Äôs (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Life Begins At Forty
programme.desc: WING (FONG, ALEX), GAY (CHIN KA LOK) and FAI (TSEUNG CHI KWONG, RAM) are flatmates. They are facing their mid-life crises at the same time._x000D_ _x000D_WING used to be a renowned creative person in the advertising field. However his young boss, KI (SHEH CHARMAINE), now earns more credits than he does. KI is a perfectionist at work. She picks on WING constantly. However, when they are alone together, she is very fragile. She confuses WING completely.
